magic_moveset.name: Whispers of the Void
magic_moveset.effect: The target becomes distracted by distant whispers, decreasing their next action's effectiveness by 10%.

magic_moveset.name: Rite of Binding
magic_moveset.effect: Binds a target for 2 turns, but costs 1 HP to maintain the bond per round.

magic_moveset.name: Eldritch Mark
magic_moveset.effect: Marks the target with a visible sigil, making them more vulnerable to all attacks. Enemy recieves an additional 1d4 from all sources.

magic_moveset.name: Mind Fray
magic_moveset.effect: Disrupts the target's mind, reducing their mental clarity.

magic_moveset.name: Essence Drain
magic_moveset.effect: Drains HP from the target, healing 1d3 for the user .

magic_moveset.name: Unleash the Unseen
magic_moveset.effect: Summons a spectral entity that attacks all nearby enemies for 1 round.
